item.title: Trade Deadline Recap & Updated Buyout Candidates
item.itunes:title: Trade Deadline Recap & Updated Buyout Candidates
item.description: Keith Smith and Scott Allen recap the Trade Deadline (00:18). Then look at updated buyout candidate list (27:00). Finally, what's next (34:53).

item.summary: Keith Smith and Scott Allen talk about the Western Conference buyers and sellers at the trade deadline (2:23). Then look at Keith's list of buyout candidates once the trade deadline has passed (17:04). Finally, what's next (23:47).
item.author: Julio César Fernández Muñoz

item.summary: Keith Smith and Scott Allen talk about the new trade machine on spotrac.com (00:19). Then they recap the Heat-Hornets trade that sent Terry Rozier to the Heat and Kyle Lowry to the Hornets (03:27), Doc Rivers to the Bucks (10:27), Wes Unseld Jr out in Washington (18:03) and Eastern Conference buyers and sellers at the trade deadline (22:09). Finally, what's next (37:51).
item.author: Julio César Fernández Muñoz

item.summary: Keith Smith and Scott Allen talk about the Pacers-Toronto-Pelicans trades that sent Pascal Siakam to the Pacers and Bruce Brown Jr to the Raptors (00:21). Then they recap the Pistons-Wizards trade that sent Marvin Bagley III to the Wizards (20:17), talk about Keith's Trade Primer piece on spotrac.com (29:10) and Kawhi Leonard's extension with the Clippers (42:12). Finally, what's next (51:10).
item.author: Julio César Fernández Muñoz

item.summary: Keith Smith and Scott Allen talk about Erik Spoelstra’s new extension (00:59). Then they recap the Knicks-Raptors trade that sent OG Anunoby to the Knicks (02:48), trade outlooks for the top NBA teams (10:04) and minor transactions (24:32). Finally, what's next (36:01).
item.author: Julio César Fernández Muñoz
